member.name: M:XSockets.Protocol.XSocketProtocol.DoHandshake
member.summary: Override this and implement all things for your protocol. Validate if needed and also parse out Controller, Fields etc

member.name: M:XSockets.Protocol.XSocketProtocol.Opened
member.summary: Will be called before receive starts. Override this to send message to the client about protocol being opened

member.name: M:XSockets.Protocol.XSocketProtocol.OnIncomingTextFrame(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Byte})
member.summary: If you override this method be sure to pass an ITextArgs object into the XSocketPipeline.OnMessage method

member.name: M:XSockets.Protocol.XSocketProtocol.OnOutgoingTextFrame(XSockets.Core.Common.Socket.Event.Interface.ITextArgs)
member.summary: Override if you need to transform ITextArgs to fit your custom protocol (WAMP etc)
